Alignment Cant Attributes
=========================



```
concept {
    IfcAlignmentCant:Segments -> IfcAlignmentCantSegment
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:StartDistAlong -> IfcLengthMeasure_0
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:HorizontalLength -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:StartCantLeft -> IfcLengthMeasure_1
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:EndCantLeft -> IfcLengthMeasure_2
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:StartCantRight -> IfcLengthMeasure_3
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:EndCantRight -> IfcLengthMeasure_4
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:SmoothingLength -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:PredefinedType -> IfcAlignmentCantSegmentTypeEnum
}
```
